original: Arm in arm, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] and I wandered off to a nearby stream. We have laughed and shared confidences for an hour at least. This is the moment of truth... Is [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] ready to fall for another [FromFrom.GetManWoman]? I lean in to whisper in [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] ear...
translation: 我与[FromFrom.GetFirstName]手挽手在附近的溪流边散步，我们笑着互相分享秘密，持续了至少一个小时。这是分享八卦的时刻……[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]是不是准备搞上另一个[FromFrom.GetManWoman]？我俯下身，开始对着[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]耳朵私语……

original: Arm in arm, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] and I wandered off to a nearby stream. We have laughed and shared confidences for hours. In a companionable moment of silence, I decide to reveal the most terrible secret of all - my true feelings for [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]. I lean in to whisper in [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] ear...
translation: 我与[FromFrom.GetFirstName]手挽着手走在附近的溪流边散步，我们都很高兴并互且相分享了彼此的小秘密。在沉默了片刻后，我倚在[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]耳边公开了我最大的秘密——我与[FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]的真实感情……

original: One of the servant boys I had shadowing [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] stutters his words as he reports, whitefaced, what he saw my [GetFromFromRelation] doing with [From.GetTitledName] in one of the guest rooms! The boy was hiding behind a tapestry the whole time...
translation: 我派去跟踪[target_spy_on.GetFirstName]的一个仆人脸色发白、结结巴巴地向我报告他看到的一切，我的[GetFromFromRelation]与[From.GetTitledName]在一间客房里做了些什么。那个可怜的仆人躲在一副挂毯后从头看到尾！

original: This character is dedicated to studying the military wisdom of history's great commanders.
translation: 此角色专注于研究历史上伟大的指挥官的军事智慧。

original: This character has spent time studying the military wisdom of history's great commanders.
translation: 此角色已经花时间学习历史上伟大指挥官的军事智慧。

original: History is a subject that has always fascinated you, and you have spent the last few weeks studying the campaigns of Ashoka the Great. There are many lessons to be learned from his conquests.
translation: 历史是一个一直让你着迷的领域，你花了不少时间去学习研究阿育王的军事举措。其中有不少教训值得你思考。

original: Perhaps I, too, could achieve such greatness.
translation: 也许我也能实现这样的伟大成就。

original: I should devote more time to studying this...
translation: 我应该花更多的时间去学习这个……

original: After many months studying the campaigns of Alexander the Great you have acquired many fascinating insights and gained new wisdom in military matters. You realize that the Art of War might be well worth studying.
translation: 经过数月的时间研究亚历山大的军事策略，你已经获得了很多有趣且独到的见解，并在军事问题的看待上有了新的突破。你现在开始觉得自己也应该开始读一读《孙子兵法》。

original: After spending many months studying the campaigns of Ashoka the Great you have gained some fascinating insights and acquired new wisdom in military matters. You realize that the Art of War might be well worth studying.
translation: 经过数月的时间研究阿育王的军事策略，你已经获得了很多有趣且独到的见解，并在军事问题的看待上有了新的突破。你现在开始觉得自己也应该开始读一读《孙子兵法》。

original: I shall be a master of strategy.
translation: 我将成为一个战略大师。

original: There are other things in life as well.
translation: 生活中还有其他的事情。
